title: Design an App usable on Web and Phone.
desc: I have a startup idea and need help developping a Minimal Viable Product. My concept is an Online Service Market and will include things like:- Customer Account Creation-Login-Authentication.- Seller Account Creation-Login-Authentication.- Allowing the Seller to list and control the price of his Services being sold.- Rating of transaction by Customer.- Geolocalisation, integration of a Map API, calculating distances (initially Canada/US at a minimum).- Managing Transactions, ideally offering many payment options.- Keeping track of basic web page analytics in order to help further improve the concept.- Collecting transaction data to facilitate business management.- There is also potentially the need for a small phone App to warn the seller of a service request, informing him of the details and having him acknowledge.I have basic skills in Ruby on Rails and I would prefer if Rails could play a key part in the project.  This can be discussed however if Rails is not the best approach.I am looking for someone who can set my project on strong foundations on which I will be able to grow. I'd rather start with someone who has great database, programming skills and then work on the esthetics / front end later with someone else if needed.

title: Fix bugs in a React Native plugin (iOS & Android)
desc: We need to fix 2 bugs within a React Native audio plugin.Plugin: [url removed, login to view]1. Add a method for a time callbackWe need a callback which sends the current play time back to the Javascript part of our app. The callback should be fired every second from the native side. The function should be named "onTimeUpdate", so we are able to add this function to our Javascript code:[url removed, login to view]((second) => { ... });2. Fix issue with battery saving mode on Android 6.0+When the battery saving mode is activated, we are not able to play remote urls anymore while the app is in background. F.e:var player = new Player("[url removed, login to view]");[url removed, login to view]();won't work, until the app goes back to foreground. Other apps like Spotify are working, so I guess you need to change something in the native part of the plugin (foreground service?).If you are interested in this project, please add the message "I've read the description" to your offer, so we can sort out automatically generated offers.

Usually such work will be done in a limited capacity and for a limited time-span, so it can be achieved in parallel to the "day job" of the freelancer.2. Help the Xamarin developer employed by the company, from time to time, with some of his development tasks3. Investigate technical and technological issues related to Xamarin Forms development, and provide company with results and recommendations.Freelancer must have strong knowledge and PROVEN EXPERIENCE (which freelancer can demonstrate) with XAMARIN, especially with XAMARIN FORMS, and with COMPONENTS AND FRAMEWORKS for use in XAMARIN.Also, freelancer should have the ability to explain and demonstrate clearly development issues which company asked him to perform.Having a knowledge (which freelancer can demonstrate) in one or more of the following domains will be considered as am advantage of the freelancer:1. Integrating graphics and animation into a Xamarin App (pixel perfect!)2. Implementing excellent UI and user experience, using best design of Forms and special user-interface-gestures (swiping, infinite scroll, drag-drop, using animated controls, etc.)3. Using the camera and gallery of the devices4. Implementing notifications and real-time communication inside Apps5. Communicating with API in general, and communicating with common APIs (authenticating with Facebook/Google/Twitter and others, Email distribution, Sending SMS messages, mapping, etc.)6. Caching data on devices7. Providing means to collect information about exceptions, which later can be used to easily fix bugs causing them8. building efficient apps - fast, small size, etc.

desc: Qualification Requirements: - Our application is fully designed and developed and we are looking for a new “look and feel” and mobile app deployment.Requirements:4+ years of experience and full understanding of CSS, HTML 5 Design4 +mobile APP Apple iOS development and deployment-Must have strong problem solving skills: must be creative, adaptable, logical and thorough, and be willing to work in a team environment -Proficient with Objective-C, and/or C, C++ -Must know the iPhone SDK inside and out- Excellent understanding of SQL database design and ArchitectureYour responsibilities:- Review and perform a technical analysis of current design and requirements-Create new look and feel site mockups for website and mobile app-Integrate new website pages and mobile user interfaces- Produce a solid, detailed technical design and project timelines- Write clean, modular, robust code to implement the desired requirements- Contribute ideas for making the application(s) better and easier to useYour qualifications:-Strong CSS and HTML5-Strong Mobile App coding experience- A work style that is extremely detail oriented
